theory.title: How it works (TDS Theory)
theory.asymmetricDesc: have broken symmetry but are not anomalies yet
theory.anomalyDesc: are high-energy symmetry violations that spread to neighbors
theory.observe2: Click "Add Anomaly" to inject red anomalies
theory.observe3: Watch anomalies spread to yellow neighbors
theory.observe4: Yellow nodes may become red or return to green
theory.observe5: Enable auto-mode to see continuous dynamics
theory.theoryDesc: proposes that fundamental physical phenomena emerge from reversible symmetry dynamics in a discrete lattice structure. The theory suggests that dark matter, matter-antimatter asymmetry, and quantum measurement can be explained through symmetry transitions and anomaly propagation without introducing new particles.
